Actions.Name: Razor Wind
Actions.Effects: Repeat the following effect twice: Dash 1, then area effect: burst 1 (self): 2 damage.

Actions.Name: Gust
Actions.Description: The [name] or an ally in range may fly 2.

Actions.Name: Assassinate
Actions.Description: The [name] chooses a foe in range. At the end of that foe's turn, as long as they're in range 3, teleport to any space adjacent to them, deal 2 damage, three times to them, and blind them. Reduce this damage to just 2 damage if they have an adjacent ally. Then, fly 1.
